Wisdom *__10.4__For whose cause: : Viz., for the wickedness of the race of Cain.-- Ibid. The just ... Noe.
Wisdom *__10.5__She knew the just: : She found out and approved Abraham. Ibid.
Wisdom *__10.5__And kept him strong: : Gave him strength to stand firm against the efforts of his natural tenderness, when he was ordered to sacrifice his son.
Wisdom *__10.6__Pentapolis: : The land of the five cities, Sodom, Gomorrha, etc.
